title: 360° VR-Based Mechanical Ventilation Management Training for ICU Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Basic critical care nursing knowledge and fundamental mechanical ventilation device operation experience
context.additional_context: Hybrid learning environment combining VR simulation and LMS for ICU nurses, where learners connect VR devices via personal BYOD devices to perform simulations

learning_goals: Learners can identify mechanical ventilation alarm types with 90%+ accuracy and apply appropriate response procedures.
Learners can achieve 85%+ accurate clinical decision-making in simulation-based scenarios.
Learners can attain a learning immersion score of 4.0/5.0+ in VR learning environments.
Learners show a 20%+ improvement in self-efficacy for mechanical ventilation management post-training.

resources: 3D Modeling Tool for VR Scenario Development

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
